entry.title: International Womenâ€™s Day
entry.content:
International Womenâ€™s Day is a time to reflect on progress made, to call for change and to celebrate many acts of courage and determination by ordinary women, who have played an extraordinary role in the history of their countries and communities.

In AllÂ world has made unprecedented advances, but no country has achieved gender equality.

Fifty years ago, so we landed on the moon; in the last decade, we discovered new human ancestors and photographed a black hole for the first time.

Â

entry.title: Extra Virgin Culinary Argan Oil cold pressed certified usda Organic
entry.content:
Argan Oil culinary is our mission to offer the best qualityÂ  Extra Virgin Culinary Argan Oil as it is the best edible vegetable oil in the world. Deliciously tasting, superb in composition, and nutritious. The poster child for sustainable sourcing. Undiluted, pure and organic certified. Tested for centuries, rarely produced for use outside the local communities.

Supply chain

* Based inÂ Agadir since 2007, we have established relations with the argan community involved in the Argan oil production and sharing our passion in providing the best product possible. Pure, undiluted- and tasty! We engage with scientists, researchers, share knowledge, participate in clinical trials studying the benefits of Argan oil for humans and publish results on this website.

Sustainability

* Wild harvested by hand and respectfully sourced in the Argan Bio-Reservoir around Agadir - tiznit - Tardouant where the terroir is hilly. The argan trees root deep and sun and winds have positive effects on the quality of the argan fruits.

* the first step is the Cracked by hand, the kernels are selected for artisan roasting by our â€˜maÃ®tre torrÃ©facteurâ€™ monitoring temperature, time and texture. Â After quality control, kernels are cold-pressed produced in small batches, with a rigid filtration process to provide top quality culinary argan oil.

*Â the High in class manufacturing standards, with a keen eye on hygienic standards, are observed. Tests on the chemical composition -acidity-, texture, and taste ensure only the best quality, Extra Virgin, is released for bottling into our black colored bottles.

Transparency

the clearance Argan Oil culinaryÂ Â in the value chain is key, and organic certification, such as 100% USDA organic, ensures standards are met and a paper trail on origin and pressing is documented.Â Before export, the end step befor ship made inÂ  laboratoryÂ has to release shipments after testing on purity and acidity:Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 

Delicious

But the taste is something different -and experience and knowledge matter to get a great tasting oil. Our Extra Virgin Argan OilÂ  has a delightful nutty taste and is very versatile to cook gastronomy , marinate Argan oil , bake or finish . Â The result is a luminous oil balancing layers of rich hazelnut and pistachio like flavor, Argan oil culinary is very delicious lovely,Â

entry.title: Cold pressed Argan Oil factory
entry.content:
Argan oil is also named â€œthe gold from Moroccoâ€, not only because of its exclusive taste, but also because of the way it is produced. To make culinary Argan oil, the seeds of the fruit are gently roasted in a special manner and cold pressed afterwards. Cold pressed Argan Oil factory needs Approximately 30 kg of Argan seeds are needed to press 1 l. of this precious oil. The taste of Argan oil is distinctly nutty. Rich in essential fat acids and minerals magnesium. The superior quality is achieved due to the direct roasting and pressing within 24 hours after opening of the nuts as well as the immediate bottling after the cold pressing. This ensures constant quality, Cold pressed Argan Oil factory , it preserves the vitamins and gives an optimal freshness.

Zineglob Cold pressed Argan Oil factory provide Argan oil isÂ very healthy because it contains a several minerals, vitamins and important fatty acids like:

Omega 6 and 9 ; Due to our current diet, our system get less and lesser omega 6. Omega 6 stimulates the immune cells and the immune system. Inhibits the synthesis of cholesterol. The Argan oil has a good balance of the Omega 9 and 6.

Vitamin E ; Vitamin E (tocopherol and tocotrienols) is a mixture of 8 fat soluble substances. This vitamin plays an important role in the production of red blood cells. Also vitamin E is important for the resistance and also keeps you in tissues. It is an important antioxidant which strengthens our immune system. A desert spoon of Argan oil each day helps to reduce your cholesterol level.

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  Our Cosmetics and culinary Argan oil is certified by USDA ORGANIC:

Our argan oil products are certified by organic usda extended the argan oil and the entire harvest and production. This Organic USDA label focuses on environmentally friendly production of food, cosmetics and clothing. Cold pressed Argan Oil factory gives Products with the Organic USDA label contain natural ingredients from organic cultivation. Cold pressed Argan Oil factory certified The Organic USDA certified products should be at least 95% ingredients of natural origin.

entry.title: Rose water
entry.content:
Rose water is the aqueous solution of the distillate of rose petals.

Since ancient times, this legendary flower was highly prized for its flavor source, use medicinal and nutritional properties.

An ointment of rose water is sometimes used as an emollient, and rose water is an ingredient of effective and well-tested cosmeceuticals.

Rose water helps heal wounds and sunburn damage on all skin types. It contributes to the purification and cleansing of normal skin. On oily skin, it balances the oil contents and tones the skin. Sensitive skin is cooled and soothed by the application of rose water. It also helps to reduce inflammation and increases blood supply.

Studies have shown that substance direct improvements in keratinocyte differentiation.

Keratinocytes constitute a physical barrier to our body and skin characteristics control such as hydration, wrinkles and pigmentation. Keratinocyte differentiation is disrupted in several skin diseases such as psoriasis and atopic dermatitis. Rose water has been used as a healing agent in almost all skin diseases that produce excessive scaling because it reduces the excess proliferation of keratinocytes.

When followed by the gene expression of proteins, demand rose water levels restored to normal keratinocytes in the skin hyper proliferation and upregulated in the skin hypoproliferative suggesting a "thermostat cell function".

The moisturizing effects of rose water also increase skin tone and smoothness.

Â

entry.title: black soap beldi
entry.content:

Its composition rich in Argan oil moisturizes, exfoliates, softens and nourishes the skin deeply by this black soap beldi.

Instruction for useÂ black soap beldi : Â  Apply black soap beldi than After 15 minutes in your hot bath, hot shower, steam room or hammam, using only plain water, apply black soap beldiÂ on a warm and wet body. Avoid the face and eyes to contacted black soap beldi. Leave on for up to 10 minutes then rinse with warm water. Your skin is now softer and easier to exfoliate, get ready for a scrub with the kessal glove in place apllied of black soap beldi.

This natural therapeutic black soap beldi from Morocco is made from 100% olive oil to get black soap beldiÂ . It is ideal in preparing the skin for exfoliation and has a unique ability to moisturize, and cleanse the skin as well. Rich in vitamin E, black soap beldi can be used for all types of skin.

entry.title: Unroasted Argan oil
entry.content:
Unroasted Argan oil is traditionally used as a treatment for skin diseases and as cosmetic oil for skin and hair:

"In cosmetics, Unroasted Argan oil is advocated as moisturizing oil, against juvenile acne and flaking of the skin as well as for nourishing the hair. This oil has also medicinal uses against rheumatism and the healing of burns ... Externally, Argan oil is used ... for hair as brilliantine, to fortify and ... in the treatment of wrinkled or scaly dry skin".

Unroasted Argan oil has become increasingly popular for cosmetic use. The number of personal-care products on the US market with Argan oil as an ingredient increased from just two in 2007 to over one hundred by 2011. It is sometimes mixed with pomegranate seed oil due to its anti oxidizing benefits; with vendors promoting this blend as an all-in-one serum both for skin and hair. Argan oil is also sold without additives as a natural skincare and hair care product.

The increasing popularity of Unroasted Argan oil has prompted the MoroccanÂ  government to plan for increased production: its aim is to increase annual production from approximately 2,500 to 4,000 tonnes by 2020.

Composition : 100% pure Argan oil .

entry.title: Argan oil
entry.content: Argan oil is a plant oil produced from the kernels of the Argan tree ( Argania spinosa Kernel oil.), endemic to Morocco, that is valued for its nutritive, cosmetic and numerous medicinal properties. It is also known in cosmetic use as Moroccan oil.

entry.title: Culinary Argan Oil
entry.content:
ZINEGLOB Culinary Argan Oil

Culinary Argan Oil ZINEGLOB is a food and Edible made for eating, cooking and is also used as a dietary supplement for its many health and Gastronomy benefits.

To make Culinary Argan Oil ZINEGLOB for eating the oil-rich Argan kernels are extracted from the hard Argan Fruits .
Next the white ArganÂ kernels are roasted before the final cold-pressing.

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ andÂ Health

An authentic Culinary Argan Oil ZINEGLOB prepared for eating, cooking or use as a dietary supplement should have aÂ golden brown colour,Â toasted nutty aromaÂ and deliciousÂ nutty taste.

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ andÂ Health

WhileÂ the difference between food-grade Argan Oil which is edible and cosmetic Argan Oil.
This Process ofÂ cook with culinary Argan Oil but the roasting process makes it unsuitable for cosmetic use.

Culinary Argan Oil ZINEGLOB is also a super-healthy,Â CE,Â  NOPÂ and USDA certified organic, edible oil.
It contains a wide range of healthy nutrients as well as having a great Gastronomy.

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ andÂ Health

Culinary Argan Oil has a very versatile flavour and is used to create many types ofÂ Edible including :

  1. Salad Dressings, Couscous, Tagine...
  2. Nutty Salsas
  3. Creamy, Spicy Sauces
  4. Grilled Fish
  5. Rich Toasted Cheeses Salads
  6. Dried Fruit Recipes
  7. Roasted Vegetables
  8. Biscuits and Brownies
  9. Desert Pasta Dishes
  10. Spreads and Ice Cream Toppings

In Moroccan cooking Culinary Argan Oil ZINEGLOB is used for its toasted, creamy, nutty flavour.

It is rarely used for high-temperature cooking and frying.
Culinary Argan Oil can be used for medium heat applications such as pan-frying ingredients, frying onions or frying a chicken with spices.

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ andÂ Health

It is a very versatile oil which can be used in a range of cuisines. It adds flavour and richness to sweet and savoury dishes.
Use it to create unique nutty salad dressings, sauces, pour on food, such as roasted pepper, before serving or stirred into soups, roasts or Tagines.

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ andÂ Health

Use to create sweet sauces, pour on grilled goat cheese with almonds, blend with honey to create a breakfast spread, blend with melted chocolate or cream to create unique ice cream toppings.

In Morocco this oil is most often enjoyed dipping bread into the oil and eating

Â 

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ and Health

Many studies now confirm that Culinary Argan Oil could be of value in treating symptoms of some difficult health problems.

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ andÂ Health

The oil is made up of a complex of antioxidants, fatty acids, Beta Amyrine, Butyrospermol, Lupenol, plant sterols and other powerful of bio-active nutrients.
When eaten as a supplement or added to food when cooking these nutrients have been proven to have strong health benefits for the treatment of many common health problems such as:

  1. Cholesterol Reduction
  2. Cardiovascular Disease â€“ Heart Disease
  3. Diabetes
  4. Arthritis
  5. Weight & BMI

You should always use toasted, culinary Argan Oil for a dietary supplement. Cosmetic Argan Oil is quite safe to eat but does not have the same properties. This is because the toasting process brings our certain health properties from the Argan Nut Kernels.

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ andÂ Health

You should also be aware that in Morocco we produce two slightly different types of Culinary Argan Oil.
One is used for dipping and eating with bread. This type of culinary Argan Oil has a stronger, more toasted bitter flavour and may be darker in colour.

However, the stronger toasting process reduces the healthy properties of the oil a little and can leave it a little bitter for cooking with.

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ andÂ Health

The other type is toasted less. It is more suitable for use in cooking as it has a milder, creamy and nutty flavour without bitterness.

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ andÂ Health

To make this grade of oil the nut kernels must be expertly toasted at just the right temperature and for the right length of time to allow the taste, aroma and colour to develop without compromising the nutritional value or reducing the vitamin E content.Â 

This is the best type of culinary Argan Oil to use as a health supplement and for cooking. It is currently the only grade that we stock.

You will find detailed explainations of the health benefits of using culinary Argan Oil in our separate, in-depth articles.

ZINEGLOBÂ Culinary Argan Oil For CookingÂ andÂ Health

Â

It is thus particularly recommended in the morning every day.

entry.title: Argan Oil factory from Morocco
entry.content:
Argan OilÂ FactoryÂ from Morocco

Argan oil has been a culinary staple in Morocco for centuries â€” not only because of its subtle, nutty flavor but also its wide array of potential health benefits.

This naturally occurring plant oil is derived from the kernels of the fruit of the argan tree.

Although native to Morocco, argan oil is now used across the globe for a variety of culinary, cosmetic and medicinal applications.

This article explains 12 of the most prominent health benefits and uses of argan oil.

  • 100% Organic, Multi-Purpose, Cold-Pressed Argan Oil. Beautifully Bottled in Dark Amber Glass Complete with Pipette Dropper for Ease of Use.
  • Deeply Moisturising For Beautiful, Silky Hair & Nutrient Rich for Healthy Nails. No Strong Smell, Non-Greasy, Fast Absorbing & Longer Lasting
  • High levels of Omega 6, Effectively Reduce Skin Blemishes & Stretch Marks. Vitamin E Protects Against Premature Ageing for Radiant, Wrinkle-Free, Younger Looking Skin.
  • Our Oil is Rich in Phenols & Carotenes to Soothe, Restore & Repair. Anti-Oxidants such as Saponin are added for Maximum Healthy Results.
  • Our fairly traded Organic Argan Oil is Ethically Sourced in Morocco. Not Tested on Animals.

  • Argan oil is primarily comprised of fatty acids and a variety of phenolic compounds.

    The majority of the fat content of argan oil comes from oleic and linoleic acid .

    Approximately 29â€“36% of the fatty acid content of argan oil comes from linoleic acid, orÂ omega-6, making it a good source of this essential nutrient .

    Oleic acid, though not essential, makes up 43â€“49% of the fatty acid composition of argan oil and is also a very healthy fat. Found in olive oil as well, oleic acid is renowned for its positive impact on heart health Trusted Source).

    Additionally, argan oil is a rich source ofÂ vitamin E, which is required for healthy skin, hair and eyes. This vitamin also has powerful antioxidant properties

  • Argan oil provides a good source of linoleic and oleic fatty acids, two fats known to support good health. It also boasts high levels of vitamin E.

What You Need To Know When Buying Argan Oil In Morocco or Agadir

Used by the local Amazigh people ofÂ MoroccoÂ for its ability to help heal the look of scars and for soothing rheumatic problems â€“ among many otherÂ beneficial qualitiesÂ â€“ argan oil today is one of the hottest beauty products on the market. It is widely available in spice shops throughout theÂ medinas of Morocco, but the quality varies, as does the price. With few regulations guiding the â€˜certified bioâ€™ classification, one really has to know their argan oil facts to be sure itâ€™s the real deal. Whether youâ€™re out for its healing powers, or in need of a new nutty flavor for your culinary adventures, hereâ€™s what to look for when buying argan oil in Morocco.

Color and Consistency

TrueÂ argan oilÂ should be clear, although somewhat murky, but dull yellow in color. Anything too golden may indicate that the argan oil has been mixed with other oil varieties to keep costs low. After all, 30 kilograms of nuts are required to produce one kilogram of oil. The oil should be rather light when applied to the skin, and even though the skin may not absorb it quickly, over time it will. Oil that washes off in the shower the next day may not be of the finest quality or purest form.

Price and Packaging

As with concerns over purchasing edible goods in a plastic container, itâ€™s best to buy and store argan oil in a glass bottle to avoid any contamination from the plastics. Expect to pay up toÂ cheapÂ for a bottle of quality argan oil like Olive oil price,

entry.title: Amlou Moroccan Paste
entry.content:
Amlou is a Paste Moroccan culinary preparation made from looted almonds, of organic argan oil and pure honey. It is a tonic that is served at breakfast, as a snack, in spreadable paste on barley bread, corn or wheat. It also brings all kinds of pastry. The preparation is made on the basis of toasted almonds and looted, oil roasted Argan food and pure honey.

Â 

the bereber Traditional argan almond honey paste from Agadir in Morocco
This very tasty amlou paste is best and ideal for dipping bread or as a spread.Â It contains only three ingredients: argan oil, honey, almonds
Amlou is made by hand by our family in Morocco in the city of Agadir with a stone mill and is preserved solely by the honey.Â There are no other ingredients or binders, as well as preservatives in Amlou.
The paste amlou is also very good for weight loss, for those who like to snack.Â 
If necessary, you can even add honey to make the whole thing a few little sweeter.

entry.title: Happy Motherâ€™s Day Wishing
entry.content:
Motherâ€™s Day is all about celebrating the woman who raised you and shaped who you are as a person. From all the packed lunches with napkin notes, to the bandages and kisses after falling off your bike, to being the first one to cry at your graduationâ€“ your mom was there for it all. Itâ€™s important to thank her for all the love and work she put in through the years. Remind her of your love and appreciation with the perfect Motherâ€™s Day card and message. Not sure of what to write in a Motherâ€™s Day card? Donâ€™t worry, weâ€™re here to help
Â 
Wishing you a sweet, quiet, gross-out-free Mother's Day!
Â 
Celebrating the amazing mom you are to your own kids and the wonderful aunt you are to mine!

how ever ,Â is the ranges of argan oil Cosmetic,Â  prickly pear seeds, rose water,Â  complete the beauty & well-being treatments of ZINEGLOB.
From Argan OilÂ raw materials to finished Argan OilÂ products, ZINEGLOBÂ makeÂ a process of quality control according to the Norms standards in modernÂ production department and optimized for clients satisfaction. For a quality overview, at ZINEGLOB,Â 150Â kilograms of argan Oil fruit are needed to produceÂ 1 galon of argan oil.
ZINEGLOB workÂ with their shipping partners such as FedEx, Dhl orÂ Aircargo to deliver in record time and safely up to more than 5 tons of their products.

Â 

More Pieces of information concern Argan Oil Morocco

Argan oil is taken from the argan tree, rare and endemic in south of Morocco. A Argan Oil tree specifically Moroccan. ItÂ Grow an area of more than 780,000 hectares, or near of 55% of the surface of the â€œAgadir - tiznit - taroudant - essaouirraâ€ regions. It grows inÂ everywhereÂ in those zones of Morocco.


Argan OilÂ Rich in vitamin E ( Tocopherol) also Argan Oil is the bestÂ antioxidants, Argan Oil also used for its cosmetic Beauty health properties skin and hair cares.
Argan Oil-relatedÂ withÂ the Berber Amazigh tradition, Pure Moroccan Argan oil is the oldest Berber drog.

Argan OilÂ research has shown that argan oilÂ strengthens the skin, Argan OilÂ allows the permeability of the epidermis, andÂ Argan Oil delays cellular aging and gives of elasticity of the skin and anti dan full of hair treatment from the active ingredient of Argan Oil.
Argan oil certified organic for food reduces the amount of cholesterol in the blood of the body by avoiding its deposition in the arteries,Â So it gives very good nutrition to the body,

Â 

Argan Oil is aÂ Natural Bio Oil

Argan oil is produced from the fruits of the argan tree, this latter gives a fruit that looks like almond, which is dried in the sun. Then, a kernel containing seeds is extracted from the fruit: the kernel, which will then be transformed into oil. It takes a lot of fruit to produce argan oil â€“ 100 kilograms of fresh fruit for just 1 liter of oil.

Argan oil benefits Morocco

  • Revitalizes the skin and improves the radiance of the skin.
  • Reduces the signs of aging (anti-wrinkles)
  • Regenerates and protects the skin barrier.
  • A gentle makeup remover for the eyes (removes even waterproof mascara)
  • Relieves and soothes the itching, (acne, eczema, psoriasis)
  • Protects against cracking caused by drying of the skin.
  • Natural and effective against stretch marks in pregnancy.
  • Nourishes, strengthens, and gives shine to the hair.
  • Repairs and strengthens the hair

Â 

Argan Oil ORÂ OIL OF ARGAN Morocco

Pure certified organic argan oil cosmeticsÂ extracted from the argan kernelsÂ tree,Â rareÂ Argan OilÂ trees of Morocco. An Argan OilÂ tree specifically Moroccan. ItÂ take an area of â€‹â€‹more than 750,000 hectares, or 55% of the Argan OilÂ area of â€‹â€‹the totalÂ region.Â Argan Oil benefits we can account however it is ultimate for skin care and hair care.

BENEFITS ARGAN OIL MOROCCO

--Return the skin and improves the radiance for the complexion.
â€“ makes and protects the skinâ€™s moisture epidermis.

entry.title: A Brief History Of Moroccan Argan Oil
entry.content: For centuries, Amazigh Moroccan women (Berbers or sleuths) of southwestern Morocco use Argan Oil for their food and cosmetic virtues. The people in this region have used and processed the oil for generations employing thousands of women. They have turned argan oil into one of the main economic opportunities in a region stricken by poverty and unemployment, where the only alternatives are livestock or migration. For years ZINEGLOB, extracts, produces and exports Argan Oil from Agadir where it is based in southwestern Morocco abroad to many countries. ZINEGLOB the famous Argan Oil company founded on 2006 in Agadir city on the shore of the Atlantic Ocean is a leader in its field, it is the renowned manufacturer of organic argan oil and the best organic products factory in Morocco. Beside the pure Argan Oil, ZINEGLOB is known for producing and exporting various other organic products: pure prickly pear oil, rose water, ghassoul clay, and creams â€¦. etc. In this article, we will focus on the argan oil the little miracle for the Skin, Hair and Health, and the main ZINEGLOBâ€™s products. Argan Oil production has always a socioeconomic function. For centuries the oil has been extracted from the inside nuts through an exhausting, slowly-mastered craft local women learn since an early age, and then pass on to the next generation.

entry.title: 100% Organic Fair Trade Argan Oil - Zineglob from Morocco
entry.content: A special attention was given by ZINEGLOB especially to the berber women producer of Argan Oil in order to provide the necessary and sufficient conditions to be a security for certain group of individuals belonging to marginalized populations who are experiencing a crisis of social link and their families. Open to the different components of the social economy namely, cooperatives, associations, mutual societies, foundations, economic interest groups and professional unions ,ZINEGLOB involved local populations of berbers (Amazighs) who need support to develop their work in the Southern Morocco and help with improvements to basic management of natural resources, revenue-generating activities , capacity reinforcement, and others. to achieve better results and product marketing. ZINEGLOB, the figurative and symbolic company of culinary and cosmetic Argan Oil 100% natural certified organic is a real-world example of business ethics and governance. Employing over 450 women , ZINEGLOB drawed attention to the universal, moral, intellectual and professional values of humanity and individual independence , and called on to ensure equal access to work and vocational training between the sexes and to support women's participation in decision-making, civil action and economic activities. Its culture of solidarity and collective work that constitutes the founding principle of the Social and Solidarity Economy (SSE) is part of the tradition and practices of ZINEGLOB.

entry.title: The social of Argan oil
entry.content: To ensure the sustainability of human society, it must not sustain only the necessary environmental resources, but also social resources including employees, customers (the community), and its reputation. For ZINEGLOB,sustainability is sustainable development, that means a development that meets the needs of present generations (especially the poor) without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs. Argan Oil can work magic, It is a genuine ancestral beauty secret of Moroccan women. It is the tree of life and the natural wealth of Morocco because : * It gives great attention as a nutritional prevention approach to prevent cardiovascular risk. * It can be used internally to fight against rheumatic and articular pain, and hypercholesterolemia. * It contains a high percentage of "veto steroids" which helps in lowering the levels of "bad" cholesterol. * It is Excellent for bones because it contains high levels of minerals and an important source of Omega. * It is a strong and effective antioxidant. * It Prevents many diseases and delays aging. * It protects from depression. Indeed, recent experimental studies suggest that incredible results are due to the consumption of this magical oil such as: * high size of the human especially woman (beween 1 .55 m to 1 .58 m) * High fertility. * Low rates of diabetes and cancer * high rate of Life â€¦ Besides its use as a culinary and medicinal oil, Argan Oil is used in cosmetic and beauty. Although Argan Oil has been used for centuries by Amazigh women as a moisturiser to hydrate and soften skin, body and hair, including the face, neck and everything in between in the southwestern Morocco heat. Its properties are quite diverse and manifold and it has many cosmetic and â€˜â€™therapeuticâ€™â€™ properties.
